item.brutality.excalibur.lore: The legendary§9 blade of kings, forged in Avalon and imbued with divine light. Its power reflects the courage of its wielder, a beacon of hope and justice.
item.brutality.excalibur.ability.desc.1: Crouch Right click to awaken the blade, sheathing it in a holy aura. While in this form, the wielder is capable of sending out waves of sword energy, rapidly draining durability in the process.
item.brutality.excalibur.ability.desc.2: While in the awakened form, all nearby entities are slowed down.
item.brutality.fallen_scythe.lore: Forged in§9 the shadows of forgotten battles, this scything blade hungers for the souls of the fallen. With each life it claims, its power grows, echoing the whispers of those it has slain.
item.brutality.fallen_scythe.ability.des: Gain permanent Attack Damage when on_killing a mob, max of 18 Damage.

item.brutality.terraton_hammer.lore: Forged from§9 the unyielding core of an ancient golem, this colossal hammer carries the weight of forgotten eons. Each strike echoes with the power of the earth, capable of shattering stone and bone alike. Wield it wisely, for its strength demands a heavy toll.
item.brutality.terraton_hammer.ability.d: Deal massive Damage at the cost of movement and Attack Speed.
Decreased attack and movement speed while in hand.

item.brutality.dull_knife.on_right_click: §e -Swap between 4 different emotions, granting different buffs and debuffs
item.brutality.dull_knife.sad.desc.1: 50% of all Damage instead lowers hunger

item.brutality.crease_of_creation.lore.1: §9Gravity is a harness, I have harnessed the harness.

item.brutality.truthseeker.lore: In the§9 relentless pursuit of knowledge, its blade carves through the veil of ignorance, severing falsehoods and casting light into the darkest corners of understanding. Each on_swing carries the weight of unspoken truths, leaving a path of shattered illusions and unyielding clarity in its wake.
Gain 100% increased experience from all sources.

item.brutality.max.lore.2: §7The perfected form of the M.A.X. weapon. Truly, finally, this is a weapon that can fulfill its glorious, magnificent purpose.

spell.brutality.void_walk.description.1: Blink instantly to a targeted location within range
spell.brutality.spatial_rupture.descript: Conjure a ripple in space, knocking back nearby mobs and damaging them
spell.brutality.gravitic_implosion.descr: Throw a collapsing singularity that draws in nearby mobs and deals AoE damage
spell.brutality.dematerialize.descriptio: Deletes the targeted mob, only if their§9 Health§8 is below the threshold (Deletes all drops)
spell.brutality.edge_of_oblivion.descrip: Materialize a disc of antimatter, and launches it forward, shredding through mobs
Grants §eGrace§8, nullifying the next instance of damage you take, scales with level
spell.brutality.sacrifice.description.1: §aHeals§8 nearby players, including the caster, healing is distributed evenly and any excess is transferred to the next lowest player. Prioritizes the caster
Materialize a disc of antimatter, and launches it forward, shredding through mobs
spell.brutality.divine_retribution.descr: Call down God's judgement at the targeted location
spell.brutality.light_binding.descriptio: Bind the target in shackles of light, halting their movement
spell.brutality.cosmic_cataclysm.descrip: Call down a massive meteor, causing a shockwave on impact
spell.brutality.meteor_shower.descriptio: Calls down a continuous barrage of meteors at the target location
spell.brutality.gravitokinesis.descripti: Pulls targeted mobs towards the caster, can be inverted by crouching, knocking mobs away while pushing back the player
Unleashes a continuous barrage of stars at the targeted location
spell.brutality.star_burst.description.1: Unleashes a burst of stars at the targeted direction
spell.brutality.singularity_shift.descri: Throw a star that spawns a field of augmented gravity upon impact. Gravity direction can be changed by shifting
spell.brutality.annihilation.description: Summon lances in a star around the caster. Lances apply §cHexed§8 and have a chance to explode on contact
spell.brutality.stygian_step.description: Dash forward, damaging mobs at the end of the dash
spell.brutality.chthonic_capsule.descrip: Throw out a blood clot that explodes some time after hitting the ground. Explodes prematurely when hitting an enemy
spell.brutality.brimspike.description.1: Conjure a Brimspike that spins rapidly and can be shot out, damage dealt is based on time charged
spell.brutality.brimspike.fail: §cOnly one Brimspike can be present at a time
spell.brutality.nightfall.description.1: Temporarily makes it midnight, nearby mobs are inflicted with §7Slowness§8 and§8 Blindness
spell.brutality.moonlit_mending.descript: §aHeals§8 the caster depending on the time of day, up to 100% Max Health at Midnight
spell.brutality.crescent_scythe.descript: Shoot out a Crescent Scythe that pierces infinitely and accelerates over time
spell.brutality.crescent_dart.descriptio: Shoot out a Crescent Dart that homes in onto enemies
spell.brutality.piercing_moonlight.descr: Shoot out a beam a Piercing Moonlight that pierces infinitely, deals 2x Damage at Night
message.brutality.spell_command_fail_inv: Player is not holding a Magic Tome or a Spell Scroll!
message.brutality.spell_remove_fail: Player is not holding a Magic Tome or a Spell Scroll!
message.brutality.table_of_wizardry.synt: The art of Synthesis, perfected by the fathers of magic, allows a practitioner to forcibly transcend the limits of a scroll. By fusing two spell scrolls of the same lineage and potency along with 100 %s Mana, their essences are woven together to be reborn anew as a single, superior scroll. Only those of identical strength may be merged; any imbalance in the ritual would surely result in failure.
message.brutality.table_of_wizardry.augm: The art of Augmentation, a forgotten discipline rescued from decay of time. By integrating various materials such as inks or jewels, a practitioner may refine their mediums beyond their original capacity, resulting in greater results and overall magical prowess.
Be warned that each medium only has a certain number of Augment slots, and that they are inseparable once augmented. Right click the Table with a magical medium to commence the ritual.
message.brutality.table_of_wizardry.insc: The art of Inscribing, a fundamental rite in the pursuit of true magical mastery. Through this ritual a spell's mana signature may be imbued into a medium, giving these spells a place to be called upon time and time again.

Be warned that each medium only has a certain number of Spell slots, however they may be extracted with little to no cost via the Expunge ritual. Right click the Table with a magical medium to commence the ritual.
message.brutality.table_of_wizardry.expu: The art of Expunging, the delicate yet dangerous reclamation of power. Reach into the etheric depths of a medium, to unravel a bound spell. Only the most skilled of mages may perform this rite, lest something disastrous were to occur.
message.brutality.on_cooldown: Spell is on Cooldown! You may cast in
